InteropTopic.name: InteropTopic
InteropTopic.description: Represents the interoperability topic for which notifications are sent to subscribers.

ApprovalDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic was approved.

CopyrightInformation.description: The copyright information of the interoperability topic.

CopyrightLabel.description: The copyright label of the interoperability topic.

Description.description: The description of the interoperability topic.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The last date when the interoperability topic is effective.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The first date from when the interoperability topic is effective.

GlobalUniqueIdentifier.description: The global unique identifier of the interoperability topic definition.

IsExperimental.description: Specifies whether the interoperability topic is experimental.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic record was last referenced.

LastReviewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic was last reviewed.

LastRevisedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic was last revised.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic was last viewed.

Name.description: The date when the interoperability topic was last revised.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the interoperability topic record.

PublisherId.description: The publisher of the interoperability topic.

Purpose.description: The purpose of the interoperability topic.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the interoperability topic.

SubscriberIdentifierType.description: Specifies the type of identifier assigned to the subscriber.

Title.description: The title of the interoperability topic.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the interoperability topic.

Version.description: The version of the interoperability topic.
